import React from 'react'; import { Container, Typography, List, ListItem, ListItemText, Divider, Collapse, ListItemIcon, makeStyles, } from '@mui/material'; import { ExpandLess as ExpandLessIcon, ExpandMore as ExpandMoreIcon, Star as StarIcon, Edit as EditIcon, School as SchoolIcon, Gavel as GavelIcon, Group as GroupIcon, Public as PublicIcon, } from '@mui/icons-material'; const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ nested: { paddingLeft: theme.spacing(4), }, })); const Recommendation = () => { const classes = useStyles(); const [open, setOpen] = React.useState(true); const handleClick = () => { setOpen(!open); }; return (
Recommendation {/* Tailored Professional Development */} {/* Curriculum Modification */} {/* Support for the LRE Initiative */} {/* Holistic Learning Approach */} {/* Research-Informed Instructional Designs */} {/* Continuous Evaluation */} {/* Collaborative Learning Communities */}
); }; export default Recommendation;
